short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances the Fresco experience with additional user activity monitoring

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitors the user activity status on the computer (active, idle or locked) and sends the information to Fresco so that it can show the right activity status on your avatar.
